    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "\n",
    "from techminer import DataFrame, Plot, heatmap\n",
    "\n",
    "#\n",
    "# Data loading\n",
    "#\n",
    "df = DataFrame(\n",
    "    pd.read_json(\n",
    "        \"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jdvelasq/techminer/master/data/tutorial/\"\n",
    "        + \"cleaned-data.json\",\n",
    "        orient=\"records\",\n",
    "        lines=True,\n",
    "    )\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "#\n",
    "# Columns of the dataframe\n",
    "#\n",
    "df.columns"
   ]
  },
